title: Yu+Me: dream Volume 3
description: She's got the girl of her dreams now, but Fiona still has a lot of problems. Blackmailed by her classmates, kept in the dark about her mother's death, and the sudden appearance of the Godfather she never knew she had, will Fiona be able to deal with it all, or will everything come crashing down?
author: Megan Rose Gedris
